ComicInfo.Summary:
A string of mysterious murders plagues the streets of London -- but more mysterious they seem to be the work of a group of children! What evil can be behind these grisly crimes and can Gilad and the Geomancer put an end to it?
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/eternal-warrior-24-a-bloody-day-in-london-town/4000-39432/

ComicInfo.Title: A Bloody Day In London Town
